授業目的: This course aims to enhance students’ ability to aware of, identify and analysing cultural phenomena, issues and problems in a globalizing world, as well as promoting multi-cultural diversity and multi-culturalism.
到達目標:
Students can identify cultural issues, problems and contradictions and policy initiatives to promote multi-culturalism in a globalizing world.
Each student must demonstrate the learning from, as well as beyond, taught lessons and extra-curricular activity (homework and field observation) - Final Repot with firstly: 3 Reviews on literature review and media (video-documentary) and more importantly, Mini-Project Report (4500 words) - compatible with academic / policy paper standard.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
